CustomField.description: Enables the Chatter notification sent to the public group configured for the Reference Team for any requests where the Account is marked as ‘Managed’ or no Account is specified.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables the Chatter notification sent to the public group configured for the Reference Team for any requests where the Account is marked as ‘Managed’ or no Account is specified.
CustomField.label: Request (Managed) Chatter
